summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block 2, Montlake Park Addition, being the alley between West Park Drive and Montlake Boulevard, from Shelby Street to Hamlin Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Petition No. 97668 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
